comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I'm in... I think this is SB's day to break 26:00 to Salina. In fact, if he pulls it off, I'll have my wife bake his wedding cake.

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: **WAIT A MINUTE!** Just a day or so ago, it was 27:00 that I was supposed to aim for...now you're saying 26:00?! That's like 14mph the whole way!!

comments.author: Anonymous
comments.body: Steve, When you hang a left on Fourmile Drive, hang on tight as you bounce down into Boulder Creek!

comments.author: Anonymous
comments.body: One more vote for SB making Salina in under 25:00! Go Steve!

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Funny...ha, ha. According to Google Maps, it's supposed to take [17 minutes **by car**](http://maps.google.com/maps?daddr=Fourmile+Canyon+Dr+%26+Gold+Run+Rd,+Boulder,+CO+80302+%4040.050470,-105.372410&saddr=Arapahoe+Ave+%26+CO-119,+Boulder,+CO+80302&f=d&hl=en&dq=Fourmile+Canyon+Drive+and+Gold+Run+Road+boulder,+co&sll=37.0625,-95.677068&sspn=36.042042,85.957031&om=1)!

comments.author: Greg
comments.body: You can do it Steve! I'll be in your wake, cheering you on!

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: 24:30! Holy cow. Looks like SB gets a wedding cake after all. Great job bro!

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Mmmm...cake! It was fun leaving everything on the road today. My head is thumping and I'm sure the uncontrollable coughing will kick in soon. Still, it was great to push my limits today, knowing my pedalling pals were doing the same. Tough riding in this warm weather, but it only gets worse from here on out. Good luck with the knife tomorrow, Dave! Thanks for riding Greg, Matt, Adriana, and Davester! **Stats:** _Time_: 24:30 _Distance_: 6.7mi _AVG Speed_: 16mph _AVG Grade_: 4% _MAX Speed_: ~35mph (short downhill)
